content.description: To gather data for a statistics project, a student asked 10 friends how many hours of sleep they got on the previous night. The data are shown in the following list.
content.question: 7659347958What is the interquartile range (<math alttext="I Q R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>IQR</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) of the number of hours of sleep shown in the list?

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
